org.mapdb

Class StoreOnHeap

  • org.mapdb.StoreOnHeap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConcurrencyAware, Store, StoreImmutable, Verifiable

    public class StoreOnHeap
implements Store

    Store which does not use serialization, but puts everything into on-heap Map.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  StoreOnHeap.Companion
      Represents null record, records map does not allow nulls
